|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = Winbond;W632GU6MB-12; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->

|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43694;BCM43684KRFBG; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac/ax |rad1ax = 574/1201 |acqam1 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad1ac = 867 |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad1n = 300/300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43694;BCM43684KRFBG; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad2txchains = 4 |rad2rxchains = 4 |rad2sstreams = 4 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac/ax |rad2ax = 1148/2402 |acqam2 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad2ac = 1733 |nqam2 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad2n = 600/600 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 2.4 or 5 |rad2correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad2cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
|rad3chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43694;BCM43684KRFBG; |rad3oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad3_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad3txchains = 4 |rad3rxchains = 4 |rad3sstreams = 4 |rad3stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac/ax |rad3ax = 2402 |acqam3 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad3ac = 1733 |rad3n = 600 |rad3a = 54 |rad3freq = 5 |rad3correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad3cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== This device contains three radios. Two are 4x4:4 and one is 2x2:2. The 2x2:2 and one of the 4x4:4 radios may be configured for 5GHz or 2.4GHz operation while the second 4x4:4 radio is 5GHz only. The 2x2:2 radio may be intended for DFS scanning. More details will probably come later. {{See also|TP-LINK Archer AX6000}} <!-- {{FCC ST|09/22/2019}} --> <!-- [https://www.zdnet.com/article/juniper-networks-buys-mist-systems-for-405-million/ Juniper Networks buys Mist Systems for $405 million] --> ==See also== :[[List of 802.11ax Hardware]] *[[Mist Systems AP21]] *[[Mist Systems AP41]] *[[Mist Systems AP43]] *[[Mist Systems AP61]]
[[Category:English Documentation]]
